rules_text:
[i]Landfall[/i] – Whenever a land you control enters, Pentaga Star gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever Pentaga Star deals combat damage, if a land entered under your control this turn, Pentaga Star experiments. [i](Exile the top card of your library. You may put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If you don't, you may play the exiled card this turn.)[/i]
